amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Army Reserve, $2,000,000 for a Software Engineering Institute.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1285 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1285 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S9562-9563; text: CR S9562) To make available from amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Army Reserve, $2,000,000 for a Software Engineering Institute.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1285 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1285 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum.
